name: SSS- Super Sus Storm Fighters
description:
-----------------------------------INSTRUCTIONS------------------------------------------------

1) Use A and D keys to move from side-to-side

2) Moving trees are a sign of wind- so as you see a tree moving, hold on for dear life!!

3) Dodge the thunder- or you'll DIE if you touch it

--------------STORY--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE:  this section is not important plus it's full of all sorts of garbage, nonsense talks. This is basically my journey- full of pain About how I made this game, how much time it took, how many times I had to restart because I forgot to save.. Yeah, that happens everytime... Nothing new.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HERE WE GO:

I have been working upon this for almost a week now... and it was HARD- to concentrate.. because daily, I had to remember where I left- and 1 day- I even forgot to save the project- which meant- I had to do it all over again- can u imagine?!! anyways- also, I had to sacrifice discord for two days straight!!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
